name: Sheepnip
description:
Shipirina leaves her old, boring, black and white world and begins a psychedelic journey. For every Sheepnip she eats, her world gets more distorted, though she must be careful, as too many of these can be rather dangerous.

Sheepnip was made for the SPJam 2015 event in 48 hours, with the help of Gabriel Naro for the background music and all the sound effects.

Epilepsy warning, though.
